idea: Coldrush Logistics Pvt. Ltd. is a complete coldchain logistics company focused on exclusively handling temperature sensitive products for numerous industries. Since its inception in 2012, the Coldrush has carved a niche in the industry today on PAN India level. The team delivers the requisite expertise, experience and in depth knowledge determined to constantly innovate the performance of the integrated cold chain with innovative solutions
name: COLDRUSH LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Baylor Pharmaceutical Pvt Ltd is one of the fastest growing  pharmaceutical companies in India. Baylor Pharmaceutical caters to the pharma needs of medicine branches like cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, analgesics, hematinic, anti-infectives and antibiotics, respiratory agents, anti-diabetics, immunological, etc.

Our aim is to ensure better health to the public through seamless delivery of superior pharmaceutical products, in cooperation with healthcare providers, government & non-governmental organizations and all the others involved in the process of building a healthier tomorrow.
name: BAYLOR PHARMACEUTICAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Under Dial HealtHMED Technologies LLP we have launched Health Innov8 which deals into premium range of products in Beauty, Wellness & Fitness segment.


Currently we have Marine Collagen in Blueberry & Orange flavour in Sachet form, Japanese Glutathione first time in sachet form in Blueberry & Orange flavour, Advanced Isotonic in four flavour ( Watermelon, Green Apple, Lemonade, Blueberry ), Digestive Syrup, Haematinic Syrup.


7 products are in production phase which are Marine Collagen unflavoured in Jar, Plant Based Collagen Builder in three flavour ( Cranberry, Mango with Pine Apple mixed, Orange ), Japanese Glutathione Face Wash, Japanese Glutathione Face Serum, Japanese Glutathione Night Cream.
name: DIAL HEALTHMED TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea:
The business is a Startup venture by a F&B professor from IHM (Pusa), Aneeta Myint, and Ashok Bansal - a seasoned professional in Project Management with years of experience in India and abroad.

The Startup aims to bring delicious yet healthy snacking to the vegetarian segment. Presently, all products in the market are French Fries, Smileys, Cheese Nuggets, Samosas etc – all are Potatoes, Corn flour and deep fried. Myints products are absolutely different, being fine dining gourmet experience at home with their range of frozen products.
name: KANCHA CHEENA FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED
